title: Flora, Fauna, and Foul Play
description:
What happens when a beloved sleuth becomes part of a deadly mystery?  Amanda’s family knew nothing on earth could stop Amanda from coming back for her baby.  They just hadn’t counted on someone’s rage getting in the way. 
 The clock’s ticking as the citizens of Ravenwood Cove race solve the terrible puzzle. If they don't find Amanda fast, something horrible will happen, and life in their cozy little town will never be the same again. BOOK #12 IN THE BESTSELLING RAVENWOOD COVE COZY MYSTERY SERIES
author: Carolyn L. Dean
